page.title: 08LAW AND ORDER
page.content: In Braunstone police station there are 34 policemen and 5 policewomen including 2 sargeants and 1 inspector. The police work shifts which are from 7am-3pm and 3pm-11pm and 11pm-7am. The Braunstone police station covers our area plus Leicester Forest East,Narborough,Kirby Muxloe,Croft,Littlethorpe,Enderby and Huncote. In our area most crime is committed in Braunstone estate where there are a lot of burglaries,stray dogs and a lot of graffiti on walls and pavements etc.. The Braunstone police station is 10 years old. Between January and May 1985 1100 crimes have been committed. The station has 1 cell which is only used for emergencies. Most criminals are taken straight to Wigston station. There are 3 police cars and 2 unmarked CID cars.
